dct_title_s: Nova & accuratissima totius terrarum orbis tabula nautica variationum magneticarum index juxta observationes Anno 1700 habitas
dct_description_sm: California shown as a labeled island with an indented northern coast, some places names and small islands to the east.
Title in decorative cartouche over North America. Includes two additional cartouches with text.
Map of the world showing lines of magnetic variation.
Part of the Eastern sheet repeated on the West.
Numbered "52" in right bottom corner, possibly plate from the Atlas Minor issued by R. & J. Ottens during 1725-50.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
